name: AutoComputer
long_description: With just a prompt, our desktop AI system automates steps for any complex computer usage workflow, that you can accept with a single keystroke. It makes repetitive but critical workflows such as financial data entry 2-5x faster, while providing complete visibility, control, and adaptabilityâ€”all without requiring any setup, recording, or onboarding to a new platform.
one_liner: Zero setup AI automation for workflows on your computer
